allow: Bash(zsh -c "ls -la dist/ 2>/dev/null | head -20 || echo ''No dist folder''")
Bash(zsh -c "git remote add upstream https://github.com/thawankeane/nest-inngest.git 2>&1 || echo ''Remote might already exist''")
Bash(zsh -c "git log upstream/main --oneline -5 2>&1 || git log upstream/master --oneline -5 2>&1")
